page.title: Nexent
page.subtitle: One prompt, infinite possibilities
page.description: No orchestration, no complex drag-and-drop required. Integrate data, models, and tools into one intelligent hub.
page.dataProtection: Free trial environment does not retain data. Data may be lost during updates - please take note.

page.features.title: Multi-Agent Self-Decision
page.features.description: Leveraging the ReAct framework to enable autonomous thinking, task planning, decision-making, and execution among multiple agents, automating model, data, and toolset integration within the MCP ecosystem.

page.features.title: Agent Auto-Generation
page.features.description: Intelligently generate core agent prompts based on natural language, achieving >70% accuracy within 4-5 tools, with additional optimization capabilities.

page.features.title: Scalable Data Preparation
page.features.description: Enterprise-grade scalable processing, slicing, and vectorization data framework that supports building high-quality multimodal knowledge bases from different file formats and data sources.

page.features.title: Intelligent Source Integration
page.features.description: MCP-powered tools connecting multiple knowledge bases, web sources, and data streams with business-driven data acquisition strategies, featuring end-to-end multimodal knowledge traceability and explainability.

page.features.title: Native MCP Orchestration
page.features.description: Supports seamless MCP tool onboarding and invocation, enabling sophisticated business logic implementation and workflow automation.

page.features.title: Multi-Modal Communication
page.features.description: Built on multimodal knowledge bases and advanced data processing capabilities, delivering next-gen AI agent services with native support for text, image, audio, and beyond.

embedding.emptyWarningModal.title: No Embedding Model Selected
embedding.emptyWarningModal.content: You have not selected an Embedding model. The knowledge base configuration, memory functions and some agent tools will be unavailable.
embedding.emptyWarningModal.tip: Please select a suitable Embedding model in the model configuration for a complete experience.
embedding.emptyWarningModal.ok_continue: Got it, continue to the next step
embedding.unavaliableWarningModal.title: Embedding Model Connectivity Not Confirmed
embedding.unavaliableWarningModal.conten: The Embedding model you selected has not been confirmed connected. Continuing may cause errors in subsequent knowledge base creation, memory generation, and agent tool calls, affecting your normal experience.
embedding.unavaliableWarningModal.tip: Please wait for the connectivity check to complete before continuing.
embedding.unavaliableWarningModal.ok: Got it, continue to the next step
embedding.modifyWarningModal.title: Modify Embedding Model
embedding.modifyWarningModal.content: You are attempting to modify an active Embedding model configuration. This will temporarily disable files previously cleaned with that model, created knowledge bases, and generated memory entries.
embedding.knowledgeBaseDisabledWarningMo: You have not configured an Embedding model. Knowledge base features are temporarily disabled.
embedding.knowledgeBaseAutoDeselectModal: Due to your change of the Embedding configuration, the incompatible knowledge bases have been automatically removed.
embedding.agentToolAutoDeselectModal.con: Due to not configuring the Embedding model, the unavailable agent tools have been automatically removed.
